property.code:
{{velocity}} #set($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use("Macros.HomeBlockMacro")) #set($top-bgcolor = $xcontext.macro.params.top-bgcolor) #set($top-textcolor = $xcontext.macro.params.top-textcolor) #set($bordercolor = $xcontext.macro.params.bordercolor) #set($title = $xcontext.macro.params.title) #set($height = $xcontext.macro.params.height) #set($image = $xcontext.macro.params.image) #set($image-width = $xcontext.macro.params.image-width) #set($image-height = $xcontext.macro.params.image-height) #set($top-height = $xcontext.macro.params.top-height) #set($text-height = $xcontext.macro.params.text-height) #set($text-textcolor = $xcontext.macro.params.text-textcolor) #set($text-bgcolor = $xcontext.macro.params.text-bgcolor) #set($buttons = $xcontext.macro.params.buttons) #set($classes = $!xcontext.macro.params.classes) #set($icon = $!xcontext.macro.params.icon) #if($icon) #set($classes = "$!{classes} fa-icon fa-${icon}") #end
#set($viewMode = "view") #if ($xcontext.action == 'edit' || $request.outputSyntax == 'annotatedhtml' || $request.sheet == 'CKEditor.HTMLConverter') #set($viewMode = "edit") #end
#if($viewMode == "edit") (% class="row" %)((( #end (% class="home-block columns #if($viewMode == "edit") home-block-edit#end $!{classes}" %)((( (% class="home-block-block" style="border-color: $!{bordercolor}; height: $!{height};" %)((( (% class="home-block-box" style="color: $!{top-textcolor}; background-color: $!{top-bgcolor}; height: $!{top-height};" %)((( #if($doc.getAttachment($image)) [[image:${image}||width="$!{image-width}" height="$!{image-height}"]] #end
=== ${title} === ))) (% class="home-block-content" style="color: $!{text-textcolor}; background-color: $!{text-bgcolor}; min-height: $!{text-height};" %)((( (% class="home-block-wikimacrocontent #if($buttons=="yes")home-block-btn#elseif($buttons=="aligned")home-block-btn home-block-btnaligned#end" %) ((( {{wikimacrocontent /}} ## $xcontext.macro.content
))) (% class="home-block-children" %) ((( #if($xcontext.macro.params.children)
#if($xcontext.macro.params.childrenParentPage && $xcontext.macro.params.childrenParentPage!="")
{{documentTree root="document:$xcontext.macro.params.childrenParentPage" /}} #else
{{children /}} #end
#end ))) ))) ))) ))) #if($viewMode == "edit") ))) #end {{/velocity}}

property.contentDescription: Content to display in the Card

property.description: Title to show in the block
Image to show in the block
Background color of the top block
Background Color of the text section
Show links as links, or as buttons or bottom aligned buttons (no, yes, aligned)
Parent page to use for the displayed children
